_88forceMaxPoints.description: Whether to force this question to be awarded maximum points on a regrade.

_88questionId.description: Question ID (directory name of the question).

___numberChoose.description: Number of questions to choose from this zone.

___maxPoints.description: Only this many of the points that are awarded for answering questions in this zone will count toward the total points.

___title.description: Zone title, displayed to the students at the top of the question list for the zone.

___questions.description: Array of questions in the zone.

___numberChoose.description: Number of questions to choose from this group.

___alternatives.description: Array of question alternatives to choose from.

___triesPerVariant.description: The maximum number of graded submissions allowed for each question instance.

___bestQuestions.description: Only this many of the questions in this zone, with the highest number of awarded points, will count toward the total points.

___numberChoose.description: Number of questions to choose from this group.

$eref.description: Whether to force this question to be awarded maximum points on a regrade.

___alternatives.description: Array of question alternatives to choose from.

___triesPerVariant.description: The maximum number of graded submissions allowed for each question instance.

$eref.description: Question ID (directory name of the question).

$eref.description: Whether to force this question to be awarded maximum points on a regrade.
Question ID (directory name of the question).

___triesPerVariant.description: The maximum number of graded submissions allowed for each question instance.

_88accessRule.description: An access rule that permits people to access this assessment. All restrictions in the rule must be satisfied for the rule to allow access.

___credit.description: How much credit is awarded for doing the homework, as a percentage (100 means full credit).

___timeLimitMin.description: The time limit to complete the assessment, in minutes (only for Exams).

___password.description: Password to begin the assessment (only for Exams).

___startDate.description: The earliest date on which access is permitted.

___mode.description: The server mode required for access.

___role.description: The minimum user role required for access.

___endDate.description: The latest date on which access is permitted.

___examUuid.description: The scheduler exam UUID for which a student must be registered.

___uids.description: A list of UIDs (like 'username@example.com', one of which is required for access

___SEBConfig.description: Configuration related to Safe Exam Browser

___password.description: Password protect the SEB exam and config file

___quitPassword.description: If set, requires password to quit SEB other than visiting the quitURL page

___allowPrograms.description: Keyword array for allowed programs in SEB

___allowIssueReporting.description: Whether to allow students to report issues for assessment questions

___shuffleQuestions.description: Whether the questions will be shuffled in the student view of an assessment (Homework only)

___set.description: Which assessmentSet this one belongs to (e.g., 'Homework', 'Practice Quiz').

___constantQuestionValue.description: Whether to keep the value of a question constant after a student solves it correctly.

___autoClose.description: Whether to automatically close the assessment after a period of inactivity.

___title.description: The title of the assessment (e.g., 'Derivatives and anti-derivatives').

___zones.description: Array of "zones" in the assessment, each containing questions that can be randomized within the zone.

___numberChoose.description: Number of questions to choose from this zone.

___maxPoints.description: Only this many of the points that are awarded for answering questions in this zone will count toward the total points.

___title.description: Zone title, displayed to the students at the top of the question list for the zone.

___questions.description: Array of questions in the zone.

___bestQuestions.description: Only this many of the questions in this zone, with the highest number of awarded points, will count toward the total points.

___text.description: HTML text shown on the assessment overview page.

___multipleInstance.description: Whether to allow students to create additional instances of the assessment

___number.description: The number of this assessment within the set (e.g., '1', '2R', '3B').

___maxPoints.description: The maximum number of points that can be earned for this assessment.

___allowAccess.description: List of access rules for the assessment. Access is permitted if any access rule is satisfied.

$eref.description: An access rule that permits people to access this assessment. All restrictions in the rule must be satisfied for the rule to allow access.

___credit.description: How much credit is awarded for doing the homework, as a percentage (100 means full credit).

___timeLimitMin.description: The time limit to complete the assessment, in minutes (only for Exams).

___password.description: Password to begin the assessment (only for Exams).

___startDate.description: The earliest date on which access is permitted.

___mode.description: The server mode required for access.

___role.description: The minimum user role required for access.

___endDate.description: The latest date on which access is permitted.

___examUuid.description: The scheduler exam UUID for which a student must be registered.

___uids.description: A list of UIDs (like 'username@example.com', one of which is required for access
